text:
1. Preparing the dough
2. Stretching the dough into a round shape
3. Tossing the dough into the air
4. Catching the dough with both hands
5. Spinning the dough in the air
6. Repeating the tossing and spinning motion multiple times
7. Shaping the dough into a desired thickness and size
8. Adding toppings and sauce to the dough
9. Baking the pizza in an oven
10. Removing the pizza from the oven
11. Slicing the pizza into pieces
12. Serving the pizza to customers
